issues.title: CVE-2022-0847 (The Dirty Pipe Vulnerability)
Create /dev/disk/* symlink to boot disk, for use by Ignition config
Handle re-invocations of coreos-installer on a new disk
New Package Request: nano (and explicit choice for default editor)
CVE-2021-4034 (polkit) & CVE-2021-45469 (kernel)
RFE: generate chrony configuration on AzureStack
Support firstboot networking configuration in `/etc/coreos-firstboot-network`
RFE: use ptp_hyperv hardware clock on Azure
Ignition's "wrote ssh authorized keys file" report accumulates in `/etc/issue`
"Ignition previously ran" warning when reprovisioning using a non-CoreOS live system
m6i instances fail to boot - kernel crashlooping
Support converting the live ISO into a minimal live ISO
Ignition kargs helper should succeed on live systems if kargs are already correct
Platform Request: Nutanix AOS with AHV
Rebased to Fedora 35
NetworkManager and UDEV race condition
Incorrect mode (SGID bit set) for directories created via overlay.d in fedora-coreos-config
initrd: nm-initrd.service fails to spawn depending on console setup
Remove /boot RW workaround for kdump
kola: podman.base/resources test failing with a race condition
